string.text: Another fool enters our domain. Surrender your gold or forfeit your life!
What do you want of me?
Who are you to approach me? Speak, my patience wears thin.
Halt there! Who are you? I would know whom I slay.
I am at your beckon call. How may I serve?
{STR_SALUTATION}... I will make sure you remain unburied after you fall.
Say what you will, afterwards you will perish.
If you die well today, you will join my armies in death.
